mapper.sql: id, course_id, unit_name, joint_name, delStatus, unit_index
mapper.select: select u.id id,count(t.id) number , u.unit_name unitName,u.course_id courseId,course.label label,course.grade grade,course.version version from teks_unit u left join test_record t on u.id=t.unit_id join teks_course course on course.id = u.course_id join teks teks on teks.unit_id=u.id where (u.id>=#{startUnitId} and u.id <= #{endUnitId}) and u.course_id =#{courseId} group by u.id order by u.id asc;
